attributes.review: It ate my bed and held me hostage!! I was walking my pet rock to the dollar store and maybe steal a pebble but we didnt. When I realized that the app did it, I put it in time out when it came to life and held me and my pet rock hostage, and not the good kind like in 365 days! My rock then called his friends, paper and scissors, and they beat it up so we escaped. All in all it was a bad experience so 1 star.
